description.narrative: 'The is implemented with 2 main phases, including: Phase 1 is for piloting the model of collecting and sorting waste at source and creatively recycling plastic waste at Long Hung B1 primary school, Lap Vo district, Dong Thap province; phase 2 will be to learn from experience and complete the phase 1 model, then expand it to 2 more Long Hung B2 and 3 primary schools in the same area. The initiative is aimed at the disadvantaged group, which is children, equipping them with basic knowledge related to waste, sorting and minimizing waste at source, properly understanding about reusable and recyclable plastic waste, which is one of the important factors, contributing to more effective solid waste management and pollution control today. The three-pillar approach is as follow: 1) school - where children receive basic knowledge about waste, participate in extracurricular activities to create reusable and recycled products from plastic with images realistic, vivid instructions; 2) family – through parent-teachermeetings with the school, children's families, especially poor and near-poor households, will be propagated to limit the use of non-biodegradable plastic packaging as well as single-use plastic products, propagating the harmful effects of directly dumpingwaste into rivers, lakes and canals, thereby raising awareness in environmental protection, as well as supporting children to perform well in extracurricular activities; 3) local– coordinate with Long Hung B Commune People's Committee, Vietnam FatherlandFront in the commune to carry out propaganda, as well as consult, build garbage collection contracts based on the guidance of the Ministry of Natural Resources and Environment

participating-org.narrative: Institute of Environmental Science, Engineering and Management, Industrial University of Ho Chi Minh city (IUH) was established on 01 December 2006 according to the Decision no. 2206/QD-DHCN approved by Rector of Industrial University of Ho Chi Minh city. The institute has the vision to become a prestigious training and research institution in Vietnam in the field of application-oriented environment, on par with advanced countries in Southeast Asia in human resource training, scientific research-development, and technology transfer. Institute of Environmental Science, Engineering and Management is a prestigious training, scientific research and technology transfer institution of the whole country. The Institute provides human resources with professionalqualifications and professional skills approaching practice in the fields of environmental technology, environmental resource management, environmental science,promoting sustainable development, socio-economic stability of the country, contributing to the mission of protecting the global environment.

mailing-address.narrative: PO box 30919, 2500 GX The Hague, The Netherlands

sector.narrative: The right to social and political participation
